Creates a new collaboration space owned by the client the user is authenticated against

  title={"Body"}

created","required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string"},"category":{"type":"string"}},"title":"AbstractCollaborationSpace"},{"type":"object","properties":{"collaborators":{"type":"array","items":{"description":"CollaboratorCreate","allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Abstract Collaborator","properties":{"clientId":{"type":"string"}},"discriminator":{"propertyName":"role","mapping":{"CodeProvider":{"type":"object","x-ogen-name":"CodeProvider","description":"Someone who provides code","properties":{"role":{"type":"string","example":"CodeProvider"},"algoSettings":{"type":"object","properties":{"test":{"type":"string"}}}},"title":"CollaboratorRoleCodeProvider"},"DataProvider":{"type":"object","x-ogen-name":"DataProvider","description":"Someone who provides consumes data","properties":{"role":{"type":"string","example":"DataConsumer"}},"title":"CollaboratorRoleDataConsumer"}}},"oneOf":[{"type":"object","x-ogen-name":"CodeProvider","description":"Someone who provides code","properties":{"role":{"type":"string","example":"CodeProvider"},"algoSettings":{"type":"object","properties":{"test":{"type":"string"}}}},"title":"CollaboratorRoleCodeProvider"},{"type":"object","x-ogen-name":"DataProvider","description":"Someone who provides Data","properties":{"role":{"type":"string","example":"DataProvider"}},"title":"CollaboratorRoleDataProvider"},{"type":"object","x-ogen-name":"DataConsumer","description":"Someone who consumes
